verses.text: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.

similars.text: Make not thy gift known unto any save it be those who are of thy faith. Trifle not with sacred things.

And again, I exhort you, my brethren, that ye deny not the gifts of God, for they are many; and they come from the same God. And there are different ways that these gifts are administered; but it is the same God who worketh all in all; and they are given by the manifestations of the Spirit of God unto men, to profit them.
Now I would not have you ignorant, brethren, that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you, (but was let hitherto,) that I might have some fruit among you also, even as among other Gentiles.

verses.text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.

similars.text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men, but unto God: for no man understandeth him; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries.

Wherefore, it shall come to pass, that if you behold a spirit manifested that you cannot understand, and you receive not that spirit, ye shall ask of the Father in the name of Jesus; and if he give not unto you that spirit, then you may know that it is not of God.

Do ye not remember that I said unto you that after ye had received the Holy Ghost ye could speak with the tongue of angels? And now, how could ye speak with the tongue of angels save it were by the Holy Ghost?

And ye may know that he is, by the power of the Holy Ghost; wherefore I would exhort you that ye deny not the power of God; for he worketh by power, according to the faith of the children of men, the same today and tomorrow, and forever.

And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost, it shall not be forgiven him, neither in this world, neither in the world to come.
Wherefore I say unto you, All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men: but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men.
For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.
And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven.
Yea, wo be unto him that hearkeneth unto the precepts of men, and denieth the power of God, and the gift of the Holy Ghost!

verses.text: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.

similars.text: And again, to some it is given by the Holy Ghost to know the differences of administration, as it will be pleasing unto the same Lord, according as the Lord will, suiting his mercies according to the conditions of the children of men.

verses.text: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

similars.text: And again, it is given by the Holy Ghost to some to know the diversities of operations, whether they be of God, that the manifestations of the Spirit may be given to every man to profit withal.
And all these gifts come by the Spirit of Christ; and they come unto every man severally, according as he will.
But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
And the Spirit giveth light to every man that cometh into the world; and the Spirit enlighteneth every man through the world, that hearkeneth to the voice of the Spirit.
And again, it is given by the Holy Ghost to some to know the diversities of operations, whether they be of God, that the manifestations of the Spirit may be given to every man to profit withal.
But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
For all have not every gift given unto them; for there are many gifts, and to every man is given a gift by the Spirit of God.
And the Spirit giveth light to every man that cometh into the world; and the Spirit enlighteneth every man through the world, that hearkeneth to the voice of the Spirit.

verses.text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

similars.text: For behold, to one is given by the Spirit of God, that he may teach the word of wisdom;
And again, verily I say unto you, to some is given, by the Spirit of God, the word of wisdom.
And to another, that he may teach the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
To another is given the word of knowledge, that all may be taught to be wise and to have knowledge.
To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
For behold, to one is given by the Spirit of God, that he may teach the word of wisdom;
And to another, that he may teach the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

verses.text: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;

similars.text: And to another, exceedingly great faith; and to another, the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
Wherefore, you have received the same power, and the same faith, and the same gift like unto him;
And again, to some it is given to have faith to be healed;
And to others it is given to have faith to heal.
And to another, that he may teach the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:
And to another, exceedingly great faith; and to another, the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;

verses.text: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:

similars.text: And to another is given the interpretation of tongues.
We believe in the gift of tongues, prophecy, revelation, visions, healing, interpretation of tongues, and so forth.
And again, to another, the interpretation of languages and of divers kinds of tongues.
And again, to another, the beholding of angels and ministering spirits;
And to others the discerning of spirits.
To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
And to another is given the interpretation of tongues.
And again, to another, the interpretation of languages and of divers kinds of tongues.
And again, it is given to some to speak with tongues;
And again, to another, all kinds of tongues;
And again, it is given by the Holy Ghost to some to know the diversities of operations, whether they be of God, that the manifestations of the Spirit may be given to every man to profit withal.

verses.text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.

similars.text: And all these gifts come by the Spirit of Christ; and they come unto every man severally, according as he will.
But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
And all these gifts come by the Spirit of Christ; and they come unto every man severally, according as he will.

verses.text: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.

similars.text: So we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.
Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
For the body is not one member, but many.
But now are they many members, yet but one body.
For we being many are one bread, and one body: for we are all partakers of that one bread.
What? know ye not that he which is joined to an harlot is one body? for two, saith he, shall be one flesh.
For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:
So we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.
So we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.
For we being many are one bread, and one body: for we are all partakers of that one bread.
For the body is not one member, but many.

verses.text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.

similars.text: But he that is joined unto the Lord is one spirit.

verses.text: For the body is not one member, but many.

verses.text: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

similars.text: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

verses.text: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?
But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.

similars.text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him, and to every seed his own body.
Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
Yea, he loved the people; all his saints are in thy hand: and they sat down at thy feet; every one shall receive of thy words.
But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him, and to every seed his own body.

verses.text: And if they were all one member, where were the body?
But now are they many members, yet but one body.

similars.text: So we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.
For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:
For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
For the body is not one member, but many.

For the body is not one member, but many.

verses.text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:

similars.text: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.

verses.text: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.

similars.text: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:

verses.text: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.
And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.

similars.text: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.

verses.text: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.

similars.text: And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;
Behold, here is wisdom; yea, to be a seer, a revelator, a translator, and a prophet, having all the gifts of God which he bestows upon the head of the church.

verses.text: Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?
Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?

similars.text: We believe in the gift of tongues, prophecy, revelation, visions, healing, interpretation of tongues, and so forth.
And to another is given the interpretation of tongues.

verses.text: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.

similars.text: Wherefore, beware lest ye are deceived; and that ye may not be deceived seek ye earnestly the best gifts, always remembering for what they are given;
